New New York

I'm am now back in Jersey again after another fun weekend in NY staying
with friend Jason. This time Darren and his fiancee Sally came along
and we all kicked about together - we went to a broadway show on
Saturday night which was really good fun. We saw Chitty-chitty bang
bang and I paid $8 for half a small plastic cup of wine - ah the joy of
playing in manhattan :)

Today we went to the pallisades mall which is apparently the second
biggest in the states, bought a jumbo pack of razor blades (at a great
deal less than the $5 a blade you normally pay) and picked up a new
shirt. Loving consumer life.

No photos this time as I left my camera at home but I think last week
was enough photos of NY anyway. Hope you all have a great week, I dont
seem to be able to post much during the week (mainly because I don't do
much during the week - except complain about work).

Ciao
